title: "UK government to trial ‘red box’ AI tools to improve ministerial efficiency"
excerpt: "The AI “red box” tool, a reference to the way it may help members of the government complete the work in their ministerial red boxes, is able to grab and condense information from official sources, such as Hansard, the parliamentary record, or government speeches."
